title: 2019 playoff teams that could MISS the 2020 postseason (Football 8/5)
description:
There's always turnover with playoff teams and in a year like 2020, even with an expanded field, you can expect some changes to who makes the postseason. That means teams that reached the playoffs last year, have to miss it this year and that's what Will Brinson and Josh Edwards are discussing on this episode. Will and Josh (who's a great draft analyst as well for CBSSports.com) break down projected 1st-round pick Rashod Bateman opting out of the college football season (3:45), before evaluating teams that could be bound to miss the postseason (7:35). Who fits the mold for regression more in the NFC: Seahawks or Packers? Even after an appearance in the AFC Championship game, the Titans have tons of doubters (23:15). Is that fair? The Texans lost DeAndre Hopkins and have Bill O'Brien, but BOB has made the playoffs in 4 of his 6 seasons with the franchise...Who else makes this list that you really don't want to be on?
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
